: A school of fish have discovered a way to climb trees using their gills to grip onto tree trunks. They use this newfound ability to explore new environments and find food sources.
Originale: A small, curious fish decides to explore the beyond the water. It jumps onto a nearby tree and discovers a new world of insects and other creatures.
: A group of fish have evolved the ability to climb trees to escape predators and find new sources of food. They use their scales to create a makeshift nest on the branches.

Originale: A fish has been stranded on a tree for days and is determined to find a way back to the water. It uses its slimy body to create a makeshift slide down the tree, which leads it safely back into the water.
